Package com.waddle_ware.heslington_hustle

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ActivityLocation
    The ActivityLocation class represents a location within the game where activities are.
    Avatar
    The Avatar class represents the player's character in the game.
    Button
    CHANGELOG : NEW CLASS The Button class generates Buttons that are used within the screen classes.
    Font
    CHANGELOG : NEW CLASS The Font class generates the games font that are used within the screen classes.
    HeslingtonHustle
    The main class representing the game, extending LibGDX's Game class.
    HUD
    The HUD class displays game information on the screen, including: - Energy level - Time remaining - Number of times studied today - Number of times eaten today - Current day
    InteractionPopup
    The InteractionPopup class represents a pop-up message displayed when a player is within range of an interaction.
    Leaderboard
    CHANGELOG: NEW CLASS The Leaderboard class handles all backend logic for the leaderboard requirements.
    PlayerAnimator
    CHANGELOG: UPDATED CLASS ADDED ATTRIBUTES TO STORE SPRITE SHEET PNGS The PlayerAnimator class manages animation of the player character when moving.
    UserScore
    This class acts as a data type that stores a users playerName and their game score
